20110126021513.000|20110126021515.000|TR0|technology have transformed the way we 
20110126021515.000|20110126021517.000|TR0|live, work, and do business.  Steel mills 
20110126021517.000|20110126021520.000|TR0|that once needed 1,000 workers can now do

20110126022035.000|20110126022037.000|TR0|security, protect our planet, and create 
20110126022037.000|20110126022039.000|TR0|countless new jobs for our people.
20110126022039.000|20110126022041.000|TR0|
20110126022041.000|20110126022044.000|TR0|Already, we're seeing the promise of 
20110126022044.000|20110126022046.000|TR0|renewable energy. Robert and Gary Allen 
20110126022046.000|20110126022048.000|TR0|are brothers who run a small Michigan 
20110126022048.000|20110126022050.000|TR0|roofing company. After September 11th, 
20110126022050.000|20110126022052.000|TR0|they volunteered their best roofers to 
20110126022052.000|20110126022055.000|TR0|help repair the Pentagon, but half of 
20110126022055.000|20110126022057.000|TR0|their factory went unused, and the 
20110126022057.000|20110126022059.000|TR0|recession hit them hard.
20110126022059.000|20110126022101.000|TR0|
20110126022101.000|20110126022103.000|TR0|Today, with the help of a government loan, 
20110126022103.000|20110126022105.000|TR0|that empty space is being used to 
20110126022105.000|20110126022108.000|TR0|manufacture solar shingles that are being 
20110126022108.000|20110126022110.000|TR0|sold all across the country.  In Robert's 
20110126022110.000|20110126022112.000|TR0|words, "We reinvented ourselves."
20110126022112.000|20110126022114.000|TR0|

20110126023136.000|20110126023138.000|TR0|To attract new businesses to our shores,

20110126023140.000|20110126023143.000|TR0|move people, goods, and information, from 
20110126023143.000|20110126023145.000|TR0|high- speed rail to high-speed Internet.   
20110126023145.000|20110126023147.000|TR0|   (APPLAUSE)
20110126023147.000|20110126023149.000|TR0|
20110126023149.000|20110126023151.000|TR0|Our infrastructure used to be the best, 
20110126023151.000|20110126023154.000|TR0|but our lead has slipped. South Korean 
20110126023154.000|20110126023156.000|TR0|homes now have greater Internet access 
20110126023156.000|20110126023158.000|TR0|than we do. Countries in Europe and Russia

20110126023200.000|20110126023202.000|TR0|than we do.  China's building faster

20110126024026.000|20110126024028.000|TR0|So tonight, I am proposing that, starting 
20110126024028.000|20110126024030.000|TR0|this year, we freeze annual domestic 
20110126024030.000|20110126024032.000|TR0|spending for the next five years.  Now,

20110126024035.000|20110126024037.000|TR0|$400 billion over the next decade and will 
20110126024037.000|20110126024039.000|TR0|bring discretionary spending to the lowest 
20110126024039.000|20110126024041.000|TR0|share of our economy since Dwight 
20110126024041.000|20110126024043.000|TR0|Eisenhower was president.
20110126024043.000|20110126024046.000|TR0|

20110126024048.000|20110126024050.000|TR0|Already, we've frozen the salaries of 
20110126024050.000|20110126024052.000|TR0|hard-working federal employees for the

20110126024116.000|20110126024118.000|TR0|already proposed deeper cuts, and I'm

20110126024136.000|20110126024138.000|TR0|cutting is really excess weight.  Cutting

20110126024140.000|20110126024143.000|TR0|innovation and education is like 
20110126024143.000|20110126024145.000|TR0|lightening an overloaded airplane by 
20110126024145.000|20110126024147.000|TR0|removing its engine.  It may make you feel 
20110126024147.000|20110126024149.000|TR0|like you're flying high at first, but it 
20110126024149.000|20110126024151.000|TR0|won't take long before you'll feel the 
20110126024151.000|20110126024153.000|TR0|impact.
20110126024153.000|20110126024156.000|TR0|
20110126024156.000|20110126024158.000|TR0|Now, most of the cuts and savings I've 
20110126024158.000|20110126024200.000|TR0|proposed only address annual domestic 
20110126024200.000|20110126024202.000|TR0|spending, which represents a little more 
20110126024202.000|20110126024204.000|TR0|than 12 percent of our budget.  To make

20110126024209.000|20110126024211.000|TR0|spending alone will be enough. It won't.
20110126024211.000|20110126024213.000|TR0|
20110126024213.000|20110126024215.000|TR0|(APPLAUSE)
20110126024215.000|20110126024218.000|TR0|
20110126024218.000|20110126024220.000|TR0|The bipartisan fiscal commission I created 
20110126024220.000|20110126024222.000|TR0|last year made this crystal clear.  I 
20110126024222.000|20110126024224.000|TR0|don't agree with all their proposals, but 
20110126024224.000|20110126024226.000|TR0|they made important progress.  And their 
20110126024226.000|20110126024228.000|TR0|conclusion is that the only way to tackle 
20110126024228.000|20110126024231.000|TR0|our deficit is to cut excessive spending 
20110126024231.000|20110126024233.000|TR0|wherever we find it, in domestic spending, 
20110126024233.000|20110126024235.000|TR0|defense spending, health care spending, 
20110126024235.000|20110126024237.000|TR0|and spending through tax breaks and 
20110126024237.000|20110126024239.000|TR0|loopholes.
20110126024239.000|20110126024242.000|TR0|
20110126024242.000|20110126024244.000|TR0|(APPLAUSE)     This means further reducing

20110126024246.000|20110126024248.000|TR0|Medicare and Medicaid, which are the 
20110126024248.000|20110126024250.000|TR0|single biggest contributor to our

20110126025303.000|20110126025306.000|TR0|people were finally able to vote for 
20110126025306.000|20110126025308.000|TR0|independence after years of war.

20110126025726.000|20110126025728.000|TR0|future.  And that dream is the story of a 
20110126025728.000|20110126025731.000|TR0|small-business owner named Brandon Fisher.
20110126025731.000|20110126025733.000|TR0|
20110126025733.000|20110126025735.000|TR0|Brandon started a company in Berlin, 
20110126025735.000|20110126025737.000|TR0|Pennsylvania, that specializes in a new 
20110126025737.000|20110126025739.000|TR0|kind of drilling technology.  And one day 
20110126025739.000|20110126025742.000|TR0|last summer, he saw the news that halfway 
20110126025742.000|20110126025744.000|TR0|across the world, 33 men were trapped in a 
20110126025744.000|20110126025746.000|TR0|Chilean mine and no one knew how to save 
20110126025746.000|20110126025748.000|TR0|them.
20110126025748.000|20110126025750.000|TR0|
20110126025750.000|20110126025752.000|TR0|But Brandon thought his company could 
20110126025752.000|20110126025755.000|TR0|help.  And so he designed a rescue that 
20110126025755.000|20110126025757.000|TR0|would come to be known as Plan B.  His 
20110126025757.000|20110126025759.000|TR0|employees worked around the clock to 
20110126025759.000|20110126025801.000|TR0|manufacture the necessary drilling 
20110126025801.000|20110126025803.000|TR0|equipment, and Brandon left for Chile.
20110126025803.000|20110126025806.000|TR0|
20110126025806.000|20110126025808.000|TR0|Along with others, he began drilling a 
20110126025808.000|20110126025810.000|TR0|2,000-foot hole into the ground, working 
20110126025810.000|20110126025812.000|TR0|three or four hour -- three or four days 
20110126025812.000|20110126025814.000|TR0|at a time without any sleep.  Thirty-seven 
20110126025814.000|20110126025817.000|TR0|days later, Plan B succeeded, and the 
20110126025817.000|20110126025819.000|TR0|miners were rescued.
20110126025819.000|20110126025821.000|TR0|
